personalInfo.name: Vishnu Kurup
personalInfo.title: Full-Stack Web Developer
personalInfo.bio: I'm a passionate Full-Stack Developer with a strong foundation in both frontend and backend technologies. My journey in web development started with a curiosity about how things work on the internet, which led me to explore various technologies and frameworks. Recently, I've expanded my skills to include containerization with Docker and multi-container orchestration.
personalInfo.specialization: I specialize in creating responsive, user-friendly web applications using modern technologies like React, Next.js, and Django. My approach combines technical expertise with a keen eye for design and user experience. I'm also proficient in containerizing applications with Docker and managing multi-container environments with Docker Compose.
personalInfo.interests: When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or sharing my knowledge through technical writing.

experiences.title: Full-Stack Developer
responsibilities: Developed internal portals using React.js, Redux, and Tanstack Query.
Collaborated cross-functionally with Procurement, Marketing, and R&D teams.
Worked on multiple applications in collaboration with the Indian Navy, including ship maintenance systems, Indian Naval Canteen Service solutions, and the Hull Insights project.

experiences.title: Full-Stack Developer
responsibilities: Developed internal portals using React.js, Next.js, Redux, and Tanstack Query.
Built scalable backend APIs using Django for procurement and inventory management.
Containerized the entire application stack using Docker, creating separate containers for frontend, backend, and database services.
Implemented Docker Compose for orchestrating multi-container development and production environments, improving deployment consistency and developer onboarding.
Designed a CI/CD pipeline that builds Docker images and deploys containerized applications to production.
Implemented Kubernetes clusters for managing containerized applications in production environments.
Collaborated cross-functionally with Procurement, Marketing, and R&D teams.

experiences.title: Software Developer Intern
responsibilities: Refactored backend modules using Spring Boot; migrated libraries like iText and PDFBox.
Contributed to internal meeting scheduler frontend using Angular.
Worked in Agile teams and followed standard SDLC practices.

experiences.title: Software Developer Intern
responsibilities: Built a Web Student Tracker project using Java, JSP, Servlets, and MySQL.
Worked on CRM backend, optimized event creation flow, and updated legacy libraries.
Gained exposure to Angular development and large-scale systems.

projects.title: Task Manager (Dockerized Full-Stack App)
projects.description: Multi-container task management application with user authentication and task CRUD operations. Containerized Express backend and MongoDB using Docker, orchestrated via Docker Compose.

projects.title: Raw Materials Inventory Management (Backend)
projects.description: Backend system to track raw material check-ins, production steps, and outputs. Implemented CRUD operations and multi-step production handling.

projects.title: Raw Materials Inventory Management (Frontend)
projects.description: Frontend for managing raw materials inventory. Seamless API integration for real-time updates and production workflows.

projects.title: Book Your Tickets
projects.description: REST API to book, modify, and cancel tickets with show management functionality.
